mapper.select: SELECT B.B_NO, B.B_TITLE, B.B_CONTENT, B.B_WRITE_DATE, B.B_VIEW, B.B_REPLY, B.B_RECOMMEND, B.MEMBER_NO, B.TOPIC_NO, M.MARKET_CATEGORY, M.PRICE, M.COMPLETED, MEM.NICKNAME, MEM.GRADE, T.TOPIC_NAME FROM BOARD B INNER JOIN MARKET M ON B.B_NO = M.B_NO INNER JOIN MEMBER MEM ON B.MEMBER_NO = MEM.MEMBER_NO INNER JOIN TOPIC T ON B.TOPIC_NO = T.TOPIC_NO WHERE B.CAT_NO = 4 ORDER BY B.B_NO DESC LIMIT 0, 3;

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD B INNER JOIN MARKET M ON B.B_NO = M.B_NO INNER JOIN MEMBER MEM ON B.MEMBER_NO = MEM.MEMBER_NO INNER JOIN TOPIC T ON B.TOPIC_NO = T.TOPIC_NO WHERE B.CAT_NO = 4 ORDER BY B.B_NO DESC

SELECT B.B_NO, B.B_TITLE, B.B_CONTENT, B.B_WRITE_DATE, B.B_VIEW, B.B_REPLY, B.B_RECOMMEND, B.MEMBER_NO, B.TOPIC_NO, M.MARKET_CATEGORY, M.PRICE, M.COMPLETED, MEM.NICKNAME, MEM.GRADE, T.TOPIC_NAME FROM BOARD B INNER JOIN MARKET M ON B.B_NO = M.B_NO INNER JOIN MEMBER MEM ON B.MEMBER_NO = MEM.MEMBER_NO INNER JOIN TOPIC T ON B.TOPIC_NO = T.TOPIC_NO WHERE B.CAT_NO = 4 AND B_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{b_title},'%') AND TOPIC_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{topic_name},'%') ORDER BY B.B_NO DESC LIMIT #{page_start}, #{page_limit}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD B INNER JOIN MARKET M ON B.B_NO = M.B_NO INNER JOIN MEMBER MEM ON B.MEMBER_NO = MEM.MEMBER_NO INNER JOIN TOPIC T ON B.TOPIC_NO = T.TOPIC_NO WHERE B.CAT_NO = 4 AND B_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{b_title},'%') AND TOPIC_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{topic_name},'%') ORDER BY B.B_NO
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET B_VIEW = B_VIEW+1 WHERE B_NO = #{boardIdx};
mapper.select: SELECT B.B_NO, B.B_TITLE, B.B_CONTENT, B.B_WRITE_DATE, B.B_VIEW, B.B_REPLY, B.B_RECOMMEND, B.MEMBER_NO, B.TOPIC_NO, M.MARKET_CATEGORY, M.PRICE, MEM.NICKNAME, MEM.GRADE, T.TOPIC_NAME, M.STATE, M.TRADING, M.DISCOUNT FROM BOARD B INNER JOIN MARKET M ON B.B_NO = M.B_NO INNER JOIN MEMBER MEM ON B.MEMBER_NO = MEM.MEMBER_NO INNER JOIN TOPIC T ON B.TOPIC_NO = T.TOPIC_NO WHERE B.B_NO = #{boardIdx}
SELECT FILE_URL FROM FILE WHERE B_NO = #{boardIdx};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD(B_NO, B_TITLE, B_CONTENT, B_WRITE_DATE, MEMBER_NO, CAT_NO, TOPIC_NO) VALUES((SELECT T.B_NO+1 FROM (SELECT MAX(B_NO) B_NO FROM BOARD) AS T),#{b_title},#{b_content},NOW(),#{member_no},4, ${topic_no})

INSERT INTO MARKET(B_NO, MARKET_CATEGORY, PRICE, STATE, TRADING, DISCOUNT) VALUES((SELECT T.B_NO FROM (SELECT MAX(B_NO) B_NO FROM BOARD) AS T),#{market_category},#{price},#{state},#{trading},#{discount})

INSERT INTO FILE (FILE_NAME, FILE_REALNAME, FILE_URL, FILE_SIZE, B_NO, THUMBNAIL) VALUES(#{file_name}, #{file_realname}, #{file_url}, #{file_size}, (SELECT T.B_NO +1 FROM (SELECT MAX(B_NO) B_NO FROM BOARD) AS T), #{thumbnail})
INSERT INTO FILE (FILE_NAME, FILE_REALNAME, FILE_URL, FILE_SIZE, B_NO, THUMBNAIL) VALUES(#{file_name}, #{file_realname} ,#{file_url}, #{file_size}, #{b_no}, #{thumbnail})
INSERT INTO REPLY (REPLY_NO, NICKNAME, R_CONTENT, REPLY_DATE, B_NO) VALUES((SELECT T.REPLY_NO+1 FROM (SELECT MAX(REPLY_NO) REPLY_NO FROM REPLY) AS T), #{nickname} ,#{r_content}, NOW(), #{b_no})
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET B_REPLY = B_REPLY+1 WHERE B_NO = #{boardIdx};
